insert into org_qprofiles ( uuid, organization_uuid, rules_profile_uuid, parent_uuid, last_used, user_updated_at, created_at, updated_at ) values ( #{dto.uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dto.organizationUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dto.rulesProfileUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dto.parentUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dto.lastUsed, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dto.userUpdatedAt, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{now, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{now, jdbcType=BIGINT} )

group by pqp.profile_key
